name: Beard Infiltration by Hunter King
description:
Beard Infiltration is a physics-based platformer about two robbers; one who climbs on the other's beard. On ground zero, you must gracefully beard-swing through a series of challenges to reach mouth-watering cookies. Come bring out your inner cookie criminal and ride the beard waves!

Audio Credits:

"Wind, Synthesized, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

"Tap on Shoulder.wav" by ArrowheadProductions of Freesound.org

Music by Bensound.com
